title: What is the best way to teach science to my son? He is in grade 5. - Quora

response.answer_text: Experiments, and observation. Science is not about LEARNING the conclusion. It is about arriving at a conclusion. There are loads of websites that offer you hands-on science experiments you can work with. Some of my favourites are Arvind Gupta Toys Royal Institution of Science TED-Ed And as he grows up, you can use Khan Academy for more rigour. But experiments create mess. Please encourage it. Do not regiment it otherwise it will be of no use. As for the observation part, practice more mindfulness. Observing different kinds of plants or shades of a color in a picture or thickness of wood in the furniture all can used to create more observant behaviour. Hope this helps.

the best way to teach your son is to connect his studies practicaly. if you want to teach him in a proper way then connect his subject and life .what you teach try to give example from your surrounding.and tell the importance of science as well as its advantage and disadvantage
